newsitem.title: USA: United Auto, Quaker State form pact.
newsitem.headline: United Auto, Quaker State form pact.

text.p: United Auto Group Inc and Quaker State Corp said Monday they have formed a strategic alliance to market consumer products and services.
Under the agreement, Quaker State will supply United Auto with motor oil for its 37 new car dealerships and eight stand-alone United AutoMart used-vehicle facilities.

In addition, the two companies will enter into a marketing partnership to market certain products and services in the automotive aftermarket, including distribution through United Auto's new Fast Lube facilities.
